items.title: “Whiskey drinkers know that higher proof means more flavor — an uncut whiskey that’s 50% stronger will have double the flavor and aroma — and we all know that a boozier cocktail isn’t always a better one. For the Nothing Flashy, we have it both ways. It’s made with one ounce of the J. Rieger 6-yr Single Barrel Bourbon — which chimes in at 142.2 proof — diluted with half an ounce of fino sherry at the point of service. We get the boosted flavor of a barrel-proof whiskey without throwing off the balance of the classic sour. I call this process flash-dilution (hence the name): harnessing the concentrated flavor of high-proof spirits in an easy-drinking form,”
